description:
Rockus Sound Machine HD is an ambient noise machine for the HP Touchpad.  Perfect for helping you or your baby sleep, or just filling in as background noise.  The app comes with  sounds that can be set to play indefinitely or stop playing at the completion of a timer.

Features: 
Plays even when app is backgrounded or Touchpad screen is turned off (when plugged in).
19 sounds including: Airplane Interior, Cars Driving, Chimes, Fan, Fire, Frogs, Lapping Waves, Ocean Waves, Light Rain, Heavy Rain, Rainforest, Seashore, Static, Storm, Stream, Vacuum, Waterfall, Whale Song, Wind Storm.
Sound timer that can be set anywhere from 15 minutes to playing indefinitely. 
Exhibition Mode including features such as a date/time disable and nightlight.

--- If you see problems, have a sound or feature request, or just wish to comment, email support@rockus-studios.com
